name: Last Robot Survivor Needs Energy
description:
Live as long as you have as these vile beings are out to get our poor robot protagonist! Your energy is rapidly running out so it's a good thing these guys will sometimes drop power for you to use, but be careful getting too much energy and you'll overcharge, increasing your abilities and giving you a larger capacity but lowering your current charge amount and make you consume that energy all that much faster!

Enable Googly Eyes for the (personal) best experience!

Long mode is also available for those who want the monster spawning curve smoothed out a bit,

You'll want to use full screen!

Controls

WASD - Move

Esc or P- Pause Menu

R - Restart Game or Level

1,2,3 - Select option during level up
